attributes.title: The Armory - Cerebral Bore (Turok 2)
attributes.caption: It burrows into your skull, replacing your brains with an explosive. What a way to go.
attributes.description: It burrows into your skull, replacing your brains with an explosive. What a way to go.

attributes.title: The Armory - The BFG (Doom)
attributes.caption: It's called the BFG for a reason. If you have it, people should run.
attributes.description: It's called the BFG for a reason. If you have it, people should run.

attributes.title: The Armory - Lancer (Gears of War)
attributes.caption: The Lancer can cut dumb bastards in half. It's also awesome even though it's cheap.
attributes.description: The Lancer can cut dumb bastards in half. It's also awesome even though it's cheap.

attributes.title: The Armory - 2 X 4 (Splatterhouse)
attributes.caption: If it was this bad ass when the game was 2D, imagine how bad ass it'll be in the new one.
attributes.description: If it was this bad ass when the game was 2D, imagine how bad ass it'll be in the new one.

attributes.title: The Armory - Farsight XR-20 (Perfect Dark)
attributes.caption: Ever wanted to shoot a bad guy without leaving the room? With this weapon you can do exactly that.
attributes.description: Ever wanted to shoot a bad guy without leaving the room? With this weapon you can do exactly that.

attributes.title: The Armory - Shotgun (Mutliple Game Series)
attributes.caption: One weapon seems to universally be a good deterrent to ********. The Shotgun.
attributes.description: One weapon seems to universally be a good deterrent to ********. The Shotgun.

attributes.title: The Armory - The Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device (Portal)
attributes.caption: This was a triumph. I'm making a note here, huge success.
attributes.description: This was a triumph. I'm making a note here, huge success.
attributes.display_title: The Armory - The Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device (Portal)

attributes.title: The Armory - Celestial Brush (Okami)
attributes.caption: This white wolf has a paintbrush that can distort reality. We need to add it.
attributes.description: This white wolf has a paintbrush that can distort reality. We need to add it.

attributes.title: The Armory - Scorpions Spear (Mortal Kombat Series)
attributes.caption: Characters can throw fireballs, ice balls, and defy gravity with a bicycle kick, but we added a spear that can take down a man of steel.
attributes.description: Characters can throw fireballs, ice balls, and defy gravity with a bicycle kick, but we added a spear that can take down a man of steel.
attributes.display_title: The Armory - Scorpions Spear (Mortal Kombat Series)

attributes.title: The Armory - VC5 Electricity Gun (Killzone)
attributes.caption: We waited almost 4 years for Killzone 2 and it's finally here, but does it have anything worth adding. UMMMM YEAH!
attributes.description: We waited almost 4 years for Killzone 2 and it's finally here, but does it have anything worth adding. UMMMM YEAH!

attributes.title: The Armory - Jack's Arm (Madworld)
attributes.caption: His arm is made of metal, can somehow conceal a chainsaw, and all you have to do is cut off your current arm and slap this one on in it's place.
attributes.description: His arm is made of metal, can somehow conceal a chainsaw, and all you have to do is cut off your current arm and slap this one on in it's place.

attributes.title: The Armory - Final Smash (Super Smash Bros. Brawl)
attributes.caption: It will make you unleash a devastating attack on your enemies sending them flying out of sight, only to explode.
attributes.description: It will make you unleash a devastating attack on your enemies sending them flying out of sight, only to explode.
attributes.display_title: The Armory - Final Smash (Super Smash Bros. Brawl)

attributes.title: The Armory - Ulaks (Chronicles of Riddick)
attributes.caption: You may be laughing at the silly name, but you'll stop pretty darn quick when one of these are embedded into your skull.
attributes.description: You may be laughing at the silly name, but you'll stop pretty darn quick when one of these are embedded into your skull.

attributes.title: The Armory - Hidden Blade (Assassin's Creed Series)
attributes.caption: Altair may have been the first we know of to wield the hidden blade, but he most likely will not be the last.
attributes.description: Altair may have been the first we know of to wield the hidden blade, but he most likely will not be the last.
attributes.display_title: The Armory - Hidden Blade (Assassin's Creed Series)

attributes.title: The Armory - The Taser (Syphon Filter)
attributes.caption: You could be a football field away and still manage to hit someone with this weapon and send enough voltage through their body to make them burst into flames. Sounds pretty fun to me.
attributes.description: You could be a football field away and still manage to hit someone with this weapon and send enough voltage through their body to make them burst into flames. Sounds pretty fun to me.

attributes.title: The Armory - Plasmids (Bioshock)
attributes.caption: The series that throws all morality out the window and allows you to do anything you want, gets a gene altering compound added to the armory.
attributes.description: The series that throws all morality out the window and allows you to do anything you want, gets a gene altering compound added to the armory.

attributes.title: The Armory - Annihilator (Grand Theft Auto)
attributes.caption: The game may not have that many unique weapons, so sometimes you need to get inventive, and use a helicopter.
attributes.description: The game may not have that many unique weapons, so sometimes you need to get inventive, and use a helicopter.

attributes.title: The Armory - The Poke Ball (Pokemon Series)
attributes.caption: Somehow enslaving small animals is attractive to children but lets take a closer look at why this ball is evil, yet effective.
attributes.description: Somehow enslaving small animals is attractive to children but lets take a closer look at why this ball is evil, yet effective.
attributes.display_title: The Armory - The Poke Ball (Pokemon Series)

attributes.title: The Shotgun (Doom) - The Armory with Boomstick
attributes.caption: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.description: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.display_title: The Shotgun (Doom) - The Armory with Boomstick

attributes.caption: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.description: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!

attributes.title: Shiv (The Last of Us) - The Armory with Boomstick
attributes.caption: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.description: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.display_title: Shiv (The Last of Us) - The Armory with Boomstick

attributes.title: Tesla Cannon (Fallout) - The Armory with Boomstick
attributes.caption: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.description: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.display_title: Tesla Cannon (Fallout) - The Armory with Boomstick

attributes.title: Pok? Ball (Pok?mon) - The Armory with Boomstick
attributes.display_title: Pok? Ball (Pok?mon) - The Armory with Boomstick

attributes.title: The Armory - The Fiberwire (Hitman)
attributes.caption: Silent, easily concealable, and can kill a man in seconds.....unless you suck with it.
attributes.description: Silent, easily concealable, and can kill a man in seconds.....unless you suck with it.

attributes.title: Maniac Suit (COD Ghosts) - The Armory with Boomstick
attributes.caption: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.description: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.display_title: Maniac Suit (COD Ghosts) - The Armory with Boomstick

attributes.title: The Armory - The Master Sword (The Legend of Zelda Series)
attributes.caption: The Legendary sword from Zelda. Of course we've got room for it.
attributes.description: The Legendary sword from Zelda. Of course we've got room for it.
attributes.display_title: The Armory - The Master Sword (The Legend of Zelda Series)

attributes.title: Mr. Toots (Red Faction: Armageddon) - The Armory w/ Boomstick
attributes.caption: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.description: Leave a comment telling Boomstick what weapon you think belongs in the Armory!
attributes.display_title: Mr. Toots (Red Faction: Armageddon) - The Armory w/ Boomstick

attributes.title: The Armory - Red Turtle Shell (Mario Kart Series)
attributes.caption: Didn't you just love showing everyone who's boss with the turtle shell? Yeah I did too, suck it princess!
attributes.description: Didn't you just love showing everyone who's boss with the turtle shell? Yeah I did too, suck it princess!
attributes.display_title: The Armory - Red Turtle Shell (Mario Kart Series)

attributes.title: The Armory - The Whip (Castlevania)
attributes.caption: This whip can break through a brick wall. It's that awesome.
attributes.description: This whip can break through a brick wall. It's that awesome.

attributes.title: The Armory - Nintendo Wiimote (Nintendo Wii)
attributes.caption: Its caused injuries, broken our televisions and even killed a small dog. I think it's time to put it somewhere safe, before it does any more damage.
attributes.description: Its caused injuries, broken our televisions and even killed a small dog. I think it's time to put it somewhere safe, before it does any more damage.
